Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11.

DarkNumberBadge is my new Tweak that gives you the visual option to make Dark/Black all the Numbers (the Notifications) of the Badges.

If you tap/open an App, the related Badge comes back to the Default White Color, do a Respring from Settings to get them Dark/Black again!

Testers: Lorenzo Noide (la Capra), SunnyTM and KSK. Thanks so much Guys!

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Respring option from Settings.
